DOC.detailed_description: The patient randomize 4 group use Internet randomization module : Patients undergo PENS dermatome T6 conjunction implementation 1200 Kcal diet ( Group 1 ) , Patients undergo PENS T6 follow normocaloric diet ( 2000 Kcal/day ) ( Group 2 ) , Patients undergo transcutaneous electrical neurostimulation ( TENS ) dermatomes right iliac fossa ( Dermatomes T11-T12 ) follow hypocaloric diet ( 1200 Kcal/day ) ( Group 3 ) patient follow 1200 Kcal diet ( Group 4 ) . DOC.criteria: Patients obesity ( BMI > 30 Kg/m2 ) overweight ( BMI 2530 Kg/m2 ) Untreated endocrine disease cause obesity Serious psychiatric illness .
